mapper.insert:
insert into ding_dan
wybm,
ddh,
ddztId,
bjsj,
jhysrq,
yzxzl,
sjzl,
lxlx,
ewm,
yssId,
wlxxId,
fhdwId,
shdwId,
cyclId,
cysjId,
xdyhId,
bz,
bz,
values
#{wybm},
#{ddh},
#{ddztId},
now(),
#{jhysrq},
#{yzxzl},
#{sjzl},
#{lxlx},
#{ewm},
#{yssId},
#{wlxxId},
#{fhdwId},
#{shdwId},
#{cyclId},
#{cysjId},
#{xdyhId},
#{bz},
#{ddbz},
mapper.update:
update ding_dan set
jhysrq=#{jhysrq},
crksj=#{crksj},
yzxzl=#{yzxzl},
lxlx=#{lxlx},
ddztId=#{ddztId},
rkzt=#{rkzt},
sjzl=#{sjzl},
ewm=#{ewm},
yssId=#{yssId},
wlxxId=#{wlxxId},
fhdwId=#{fhdwId},
shdwId=#{shdwId},
cyclId=#{cyclId},
cysjId=#{cysjId},
bz=#{bz},
bz=#{ddbz},
where wybm=#{wybm}
mapper.select: select dd.*,ddzt.mc ddztmc,cl.cph from ding_dan dd left join ding_dan_zhuang_tai ddzt on dd.ddztId=ddzt.id left join che_liang cl on dd.cyclId=cl.id where dd.wybm=#{wybm}

select count(*) from ding_dan dd left join che_liang cl on dd.cyclId=cl.id left join yun_shu_shang yss on dd.yssId=yss.id left join ding_dan_zhuang_tai ddzt on dd.ddztId=ddzt.id left join wu_zi wz on dd.wlxxId=wz.id left join fa_huo_dan_wei fhdw on dd.fhdwId=fhdw.id left join shou_huo_dan_wei shdw on dd.shdwId=shdw.id left join si_ji sj on dd.cysjId=sj.id where 1=1
and dd.ddh like CONCAT('%',#{ddh},'%')
and dd.ddztId in (#{ddztId})
and cl.cph like CONCAT('%',#{cph},'%')
and dd.jhysrq=#{jhysrq}
and yss.mc like CONCAT('%',#{yss},'%')
and wz.mc like CONCAT('%',#{wzmc},'%')
and fhdw.dwmc like CONCAT('%',#{fhdwmc},'%')
and shdw.dwmc like CONCAT('%',#{shdwmc},'%')
and sj.xm like CONCAT('%',#{sjxm},'%')
and sj.sfz like CONCAT('%',#{sjsfz},'%')

select dd.wybm,dd.ddh,cl.cph,yss.id yssId,yss.mc yssmc,dd.wlxxId wlxxId,dd.fhdwId fhdwId,dd.shdwId shdwId,dd.cyclId cyclId,dd.cysjId cysjId,dd.lxlx,dd.jhysrq,ddzt.mc ddztmc,dd.yzxzl,dd.sjzl,dd.zlceb,dd.crksj,wz.mc wlmc,fhdw.dwmc fhdwmc,shdw.dwmc shdwmc from ding_dan dd left join che_liang cl on dd.cyclId=cl.id left join yun_shu_shang yss on dd.yssId=yss.id left join ding_dan_zhuang_tai ddzt on dd.ddztId=ddzt.id left join wu_zi wz on dd.wlxxId=wz.id left join fa_huo_dan_wei fhdw on dd.fhdwId=fhdw.id left join shou_huo_dan_wei shdw on dd.shdwId=shdw.id left join si_ji sj on dd.cysjId=sj.id where 1=1
and dd.ddh like CONCAT('%',#{ddh},'%')
and dd.ddztId in (#{ddztId})
and cl.cph like CONCAT('%',#{cph},'%')
and dd.jhysrq=#{jhysrq}
and yss.mc like CONCAT('%',#{yss},'%')
and wz.mc like CONCAT('%',#{wzmc},'%')
and fhdw.dwmc like CONCAT('%',#{fhdwmc},'%')
and shdw.dwmc like CONCAT('%',#{shdwmc},'%')
and sj.xm like CONCAT('%',#{sjxm},'%')
and sj.sfz like CONCAT('%',#{sjsfz},'%')
order by dd.bjsj desc limit #{rowNum},#{rows}

select count(*) from ding_dan dd left join ding_dan_zhuang_tai ddzt on dd.ddztId=ddzt.id left join che_liang cl on dd.cyclId=cl.id left join wu_zi wz on dd.wlxxId=wz.id left join yun_shu_shang yss on dd.yssId=yss.id left join fa_huo_dan_wei fhdw on dd.fhdwId=fhdw.id left join shou_huo_dan_wei shdw on dd.shdwId=shdw.id where 1=1
and dd.ddh like CONCAT('%',#{ddh},'%')
and dd.ddztId=#{ddztId}
and cl.cph like CONCAT('%',#{cph},'%')
and dd.jhysrq=#{jhysrq}
and wz.mc like CONCAT('%',#{wlmc},'%')
and fhdw.dwmc like CONCAT('%',#{fhdwmc},'%')
and shdw.dwmc like CONCAT('%',#{shdwmc},'%')

select count(*) from ding_dan dd left join ding_dan_zhuang_tai ddzt on dd.ddztId=ddzt.id left join che_liang cl on dd.cyclId=cl.id left join wu_zi wz on dd.wlxxId=wz.id left join yun_shu_shang yss on dd.yssId=yss.id left join fa_huo_dan_wei fhdw on dd.fhdwId=fhdw.id left join shou_huo_dan_wei shdw on dd.shdwId=shdw.id where 1=1
and dd.ddh like CONCAT('%',#{ddh},'%')
and dd.ddztId=#{ddztId}
and cl.cph like CONCAT('%',#{cph},'%')
